questions.question: Which of the following scenarios could benefit from spatial analysis?
options: You need to find how many employees missed more than five days of work in the last month from a database of employee timesheets.
You need to automate the searching and display of prices for flights on a particular route.
You need to measure the average response time in a customer support case queue system.
You need to identify the closest retail location to a customer given their location.

questions.question: Which transformer would you use to extract just the fire hydrants (points) that fall within a single neighborhood (polygon) from a larger city-wide dataset of fire hydrants?
Which transformer would you use to combine multiple polygons separated by secondary soil types into fewer larger polygons grouped by their shared primary soil type?
Which transformer would you use to create areas within 1 kilometer of a bus stop?
Which transformer would you use to combine several lines into a single geometry object containing them all?
